doc:
George Arliss https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Arliss 0 George Arliss (10 April 1868 – 5 February 1946) was an English actor, author, playwright and filmmaker who found success in the United States. He was the first British actor to win an Academy Award, as well as the earliest-born actor to win one. George_Arliss ( 10_April_1868 – 5_February_1946 ) was an_English_actor , author_,_playwright_and_filmmaker who found success in the_United_States . He was the_first_British_actor to_win an_Academy_Award , as_well_as the_earliest-born_actor to_win one .
